website_summaries.verdict: Wide slats allow water to drip through to the floor instead of soaking your feet.
pros: Slotted panels for better drying and air circulation, which helps to prevent mold
Rubber feet keep mat in place on floor
cons: Consider drying floor or placing towel under it when in use

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick rubber washers on the bottom work great on our tile floor, however our wet feet from the shower are somewhat slippery on the top side of the mat. This is not fault of the company, but something to be watchful of. Otherwise, the mat is solid and shipping was great. The condition and build is perfect. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shinner22

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Non-slip Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as pictured and described. I LOVE IT! I am so thrilled with this purchase. The mat looks great in my bathroom, it does not slip at all, is made from bamboo for sure, and was a great price. The product came packaged very well--in its own box inside of another box of the same shape--so as not to get damaged in the shipping process. The mat is very sturdy, also. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Momosa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Great Bathmat
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bathmat with rubber feet on the bottom so the wood does not touch the floor. This is helpful if your bathroom floor can collect water.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Well-made Mat
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was expecting. It is well made and It looks beautiful. I actually bought it to go with my camp shower, but it’s so nice I almost hate to use it for that. It would look very pretty in any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: It's time to stop using cloth bathmats!!! Especially useful if you can't do laundry all the time
customer_reviews.text: Finally made the switch from a cloth bath-mat after moving into a place where I don't have my own in-unit washer/dryer. Should've done it ages ago- those things never truly seem clean enough to me unless it's a fresh purchase! After getting this I started to really think about how gross those cloth mats must get. This feels much more sanitary, and I love that I can clean it whenever I want without needing to make time to head out and complete a load of laundry! Also, the switch somehow didn't lead to my bathroom floor having tons of water pooling underneath it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: zens out my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this. The first one I received came with a scratch, however their customer service was quick to replace it with a new one. I like the way it zens out my bathroom in a subtle and understated way. I don't place it in my shower, but just outside, like a bath mat.
customer_reviews.author: RiseAboveIt

customer_reviews.title: Love this bathmat
customer_reviews.text: I hated the fabric bath mats and how they would be wet for hours after a shower. This is definitely a solid solution. However you must wipe the floor and mat after showering but its not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: sam george

customer_reviews.title: I love this bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this bamboo mat. It is absolutely perfect for what I wanted it for. I needed this mat for the floor in my RV which has a combination shower and toilet closet. It fits perfect. I can also take it outside when I am camping and want to take an exterior shower. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: M. Redd

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo mat can use for other purposes
customer_reviews.text: We use this stand in our kitchen to hold up our microwave which is currently standing in a old plastic table that is not even and tiled in the middle. it is sturdy enough to hold the microwave and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Starr Z

customer_reviews.title: Not slippery
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than using a bathmat. No issues with slipping.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: this bamboo mat is a nice change. It doesn't absorb huge amounts of water ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bamboo accessories in my bathroom, and this matched those perfectly. As someone who has used cloth bathroom mats in my bathroom for a long time, this bamboo mat is a nice change. It doesn't absorb huge amounts of water like cloth mats do, but it keeps me from slipping when I step out of the shower and as long as I dont step out of the shower soaking wet, my floor is reasonably puddle free. Easy to clean and so far so good, will have to see in the long term if it develops mold, but doesn't look like it at this point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with outdoor shower. This mat is exactly what I was looking for: well built, sturdy, right height, nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Black

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sand off feet at beach house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a shower mat but main reason I camp on beach, there's alot of sand in bath house so I use this when I get out of shower and no more wet sand on my feet while I'm trying to get dressed!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Fits perfectly outside my guest bathroom tub. I have a small space in between the sink and toilet and this fits just right. It makes for a nice stepping point in between the tub and the small rug I have in the bathroom. And it just makes the entire bathroom look a little more classier. Stylish and functional. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pabon

customer_reviews.title: I love this addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to my bathroom. Mine is such a tiny NYC space and yet this gives me the impression I've walked into a spa. Really tricks the mind. Highly recommend for coming in and out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is truly non slip. Dries pretty quickly and seems very sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: MamaDink

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy poor quality and no replacement available or refund available.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in September 2018 and it fell apart by December and it appears it doesn't have any kind of warranty on it because when I went in to see if I could return it I found out that it only has a 30 day warranty. I only had until October to return it. That's a pretty crappy warranty that is only 30 days. Buy something else because this product is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks nice! It comes with little rubber feet on the bottom, so it doesn't slide.
customer_reviews.author: Sigurros

customer_reviews.title: great for kindling or repurposed as a trash can liner
customer_reviews.text: this product is worth less than the box it came in. after 2weeks of use it grew mildew. if it got wet it became slicker than greased black ice. the hair thin staples used to hold it together failed so I had to install 1" finishing screws after treating the mildew on it. I'd give NO stars but worst case scenario I can burn it if SHTF
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative to cloth/fabric bath mats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to cloth/fabric bath mats. We had to get rid of ours because my dog kept peeing on it, so this was a fantastic second choice! Definitely keeps the water contained, and much safer to step onto than the linoleum floor. Good sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elba G.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I received this bath shower mat and right out of the box, two of the bottom slats were completely detached and the others were not firmly secure. The nails used are not deep enough to attach the pieces. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will mildew in humid climate
customer_reviews.text: I live in a humid climate and using in the bathroom created mildew. Now it’s my front door mat instead
customer_reviews.author: Kalenamac

customer_reviews.title: Not durable! Tiny screws break panels loose
customer_reviews.text: I had this outside, rested up against rocks/fence for 3-4 days and i started to notice discolor/mold and by day 2, a wood piece broke off of its tiny screw/ hold. I am only 118 lbs and have stood on this, briefly, after 3 outdoor showers. There were never any rubber feet on the bottom and I have fixed now fixed four panels are ready in less than eight showers. Do not believe these reviews. I wish I never purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Becka Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Right size & height
customer_reviews.text: Not using in bath but in storage closet to get emergency water containers off the ground. Very pleased with this item not too high and easier to move around
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice, very sturdy and something I have wanted for a while.
customer_reviews.text: I only have one complaint: It's very slippery. Very slippery. Not sure if this is "age related", but I seem to have a problem with it. It really is nice however, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for Very Light Use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use for a camp shower. It broke after only a few uses. It may have been a bit rougher use than if used at home in a regular shower, but anticipated it to last more than just 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good looking, but potentially slippery
customer_reviews.text: The mat seems sturdy enough and looks fantastic. Really my only complaint is that it has this finish on top that seems like it could become a little slick but alas, haven't slipped yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up
customer_reviews.text: After a month this mat seems to be holding up well. I make sure to stand it up after most uses to make sure water doesn’t settle. It seems like it would quickly wear at the wood if you let it sit. Good for small areas like a small walk in shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slip Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. My wet foot and this bathroom mat were too slick together to keep this mat. There's no texture on the bamboo slats. Be Careful!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Alternative use keeps litter box elevated just enough for air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: JNS

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, seems sturdy, too. But it’s a bit slippery as I exit the shower onto it. My thoughts are to white wash it w/ a sand base so it’s not slippery when wet!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is described as a "non-sliding" mat. It doesn't slip on the floor but it does slip under your feet. This mat is slippery. Why would I want a mat that is slippery coming out of the tub?
customer_reviews.author: JCappoir

customer_reviews.title: Sort of ok
customer_reviews.text: The middle bar on bottom came loose after a few weeks so it was not supportable. In the garbage it went. It’s also very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SHOWER MAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bamboo bath mat. It's quite solid and well constructed, the size is perfect for my bathroom space, the non-sliding grips insures it stays put and it looks great in my bathroom! I'm totally happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Faith

customer_reviews.title: Simple will do.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple bamboo mat for our guest bathroom and this mat worked very well. The build quality is good and non slip.
customer_reviews.author: WhoBeDis

customer_reviews.title: Safety First.
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to not slide on a bathmat or slippery floor when exiting the shower or tub. Well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: This product came broken so I fixed it. After use more boards popped off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tracy jarrett

customer_reviews.title: feelsgoodman
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice , feels good to step onto it after shower
customer_reviews.author: Shreyas Nampalli

customer_reviews.title: A bit slippery.
customer_reviews.text: A bit slippery when getting out of the shower but other than that works great! No more wet towels on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All great about this item, loved the size and color!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! It fits perfectly in my Retro 177 se trailer. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo mat was a little small for my shower - but I really wanted to keep it! Unfortunately, mat did not hold up as well as I had hoped. One of the wooden supports fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: SST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! It makes me think I'm stepping out of a spa!
customer_reviews.author: M. Busby

customer_reviews.title: The grips don’t last. It slides too much. Injured myself and my son.
customer_reviews.text: The grips are awful. It slid from underneath me and left me hurt and in pain almost in my tub. Not a good buy at all. Also, the grips are not the same as what I received. I’m really unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gyasi Grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice bamboo shower mat
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described online. The size is great for the area we have as you step out of the shower. It has a nice finish and not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! My spoiled cats kept peeing on my bath mat and this was the perfect solution 😎👍🏾. Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: christopherjohnn

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart too fast.
customer_reviews.text: The two middle supports came off after only 4 months of use. Did not hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to clean. I bought two just to have a larger surface area to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burgos

customer_reviews.title: water easily drops down and gets all over my floor
customer_reviews.text: Because of the wide slats between the bamboo, water easily drops down and gets all over my floor. It then trickles down my grout and seems to find it’s way under my bath rug that is under my sink. I will be purchasing a different bamboo mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: After only three days a large crack appeared across one of the struts, returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bath mat and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SkiddyFox

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels sturdy. I bought it for an outside portable shower ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels sturdy. I bought it for an outside portable shower when camping. However, have not had the opportunity to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patti H.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Broke in a month!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made apparently. See attached photos. Became wobbly after three weeks and then broke a week later. I always sat it on side to dry after shower. Cheap rusted nails/pins!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Probably stub your toe on it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made but I had to return it. It seems like such a hazard for stubbing the toes. It sticks up high enough and is sharp enough that it could really hurt you. Very beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Not non-skid
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband’s bathroom. He tested it after a shower and it slipped on tile! He could have fallen and badly hurt. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Caeles

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: Small. Is on feet, so if you step on the edge, it can tip and be a tripping hazard..
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad because I really liked having a wooden mat
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since November 2017. Recently I was cleaning my bathroom and I noticed white and black mold growing on the back side of it. I requested a refund. This mat is a health hazard! It's too bad because I really liked having a wooden mat.
customer_reviews.author: NT Mettouchi

customer_reviews.title: Slick
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, BUT Slippery when wet/ slides out from under you if you don't step just right
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This mat is pretty, but it kind of crunches when you step ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat is pretty, but it kind of crunches when you step on it from the shower. You may still need a cushion mat under it to catch water and keep it from crunching. Also, it’s pretty tall and easy to trip over
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lind

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These two bamboo mats were very poorly constructed. I bought two previously and those stood up for several months before coming apart. These two came apart within one day. When looking at the strips, I saw that they had been glued this time. The glue did not hold. Very disappointed. I gave these a great review the last time I bought them. I take that back. I'm putting the older two together with my own glue. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi S. DiNatale

customer_reviews.title: maybe they’re just not a good idea. Also there doesn’t seem to be any ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems well-made, and definitely attractive, but it is small and VERY slippery when wet. This might be just a problem with all bamboo mats..maybe they’re just not a good idea. Also there doesn’t seem to be any absorbency to the wood. It seems like it must just puddle up underneath. Don’t dare stand on it and try to towel off anyway though...you’re liable to slip.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the WORST QUALITY I have ever seen... One of the base rails came completely off within the first few days...I tried to press the rail back on but, ALL the little nails(sticking out to hold in place 1/32") bent flat down... I went to pick it up to clean the floor underneath, and the first plank came completely OFF... DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU NEED WOOD FOR THE NEXT WINTER...
customer_reviews.author: frederick delamorton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good! Sturdy and nicely shaped. Does what I need it to do, and that is to cover up my fabric bath mat so my cat won't pee on it anymore. ;-) The only flaw was a small, dime-size scorch spot on one of the slats of wood. Looks like it might have come into contact with something hot in manufacturing process and it got a dull burn mark. But it's not that noticeable at all and since it's just going on the bathroom floor, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appears appropriate for intended use
customer_reviews.text: Just received, pretty steady to stand on, I'm 165lbs, could see >200+lbs causing some sag in it - will be used in shower shared by 3 others, so will update once used if initial eval not correct as I see. Good price for product in terms of what I wanted to spend, happy with price. Big enough to stand on in shower, don't have to squeeze feet on. Plenty of room in standing shower.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: I purchased old version?
customer_reviews.text: I use this bamboo mat, purchased January 2016. Apparently they changed feet on bottom, mine has black rectangular pads - shown in attached photo. I have to be careful tile floor does not get too wet or it does slip and slide, scary. Sometimes have to throw towel over it. Hopefully the clear circular feet pictured now are safer. Prop up against side of tub when not in use since it infringes on walking area otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Emm Ragno

customer_reviews.title: Despite that, I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: They're great! They subtly elevated the decor of my crappy bathroom! Only recommendation is make sure you give them careful look over, because their quality control people don't. I bought 2 and they both need sanding and wood chips removed. It was nothing major. Also they don't seal the holes from the nail gun during manufacturing; which means a dab of fingernail clear coat is your friend. Unless you enjoy bacteria. All that being said, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was housesitting for a friend and she had one of these. I knew I needed one. I really like this floor mat. It looks classy next to my tub and works well. Doesn't slip around and dries clean. A quick wipe with a damp cloth once in a while keeps it fresh and new. I like it better than a wrinkled bath mat that attracts things that fall to the bathroom floor.
customer_reviews.author: LMargaretMartin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to my shower
customer_reviews.text: I use this item for my indoor shower stall and it is perfect. I am a heavy person (250 lbs) and this holds my weight. Cleaning is easy -- I merely rinse both sides and I lean against shower wall to dry. Love it and will order again should the need arise!
customer_reviews.author: ArmyEngMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I Bought two of these to use as a platform for my wine cooler. The project works perfectly for this purpose...and it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this mat under a large water bowl for my dogs. My floor is slate and I noticed some mold growing under the rubber mat I was using. I thought this mat would raise the bowl a little and allow for air flow underneath. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: DHF

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo shower mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this bamboo floor mat. We have this set up in our fire station sauna. Love the material, simplistic design, durability and ease of access for cleaning. It seemed like it's going to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom shower mat
customer_reviews.text: I actually have two bathrooms with the same shower mat. Gives both bathrooms a wonderful looking clean place to get clean. Totally recommend buying to anyone
customer_reviews.author: JoneaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for shower stall drainage
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo mat is a real solution for a slow draining shower stall. Previous uses of flat, rubber shower mats resulted in water buildup at the back of the shower. Water flows underneath this mat, it's easy to stand on and also environmentally friendly. And it is priced affordably for this type of mat.
customer_reviews.author: linknk

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to step directly on the floor and get my feet dirty. I wish I could be better about keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bamboo shower mat. I use it in my bathroom. Because I have it, I don't have to step directly on the floor and get my feet dirty. I wish I could be better about keeping my bathroom floor cleaner, but I can't bring myself to clean it frequently enough. I also wear shoes in the house, which brings in all kinds of dirt. I'm especially likely to wear shoes in the bathroom after getting home from work and really having to pee. It's a damn good mat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wright

customer_reviews.title: Metal screws rust and stain
customer_reviews.text: Screws will stain tub. Actual wood not sturdy enough to withstand use in a tub.
customer_reviews.author: honestabe

customer_reviews.title: Staples rusted and boards came apart.
customer_reviews.text: I used this outside my standing shower and this product didn't last long. The connecting staples rust and boards will come apart. I would spend more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Archer7777

customer_reviews.title: Spa like , I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I put this in my bathroom lol I love how sturdy it is , looks very high end and spa like , I really enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Something different if you want to include an "spa" item in your bahtroom
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Gómez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how well made this mat is. It is replacing my folding bamboo mat which had lots of crevices that were difficult to keep clean. I use it outside of the tub with a memory foam mat on top to allow air circulation. I agree with the other reviewers that the feet on this mat are a great improvement to the previous type.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good price and are way better than the fabric mats ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price and are way better than the fabric mats I used to have (that would get wet and smell like a mildew every few days.)
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Practical, well made, easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a bath mat that is easy to keep clean that my dogs won't ruin. It also looks nice in my bathroom, and blends well with my teak squatty potty.
customer_reviews.author: Frey Family

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well-made bath mat. Feels sturdy and dries quickly. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Def what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a raised bamboo bathroom mat because I keep my cat's litter box in my bathroom and it can get messy. This solves all my problems, looks really nice, and cleans so easily. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finishing touch to my bath area
customer_reviews.text: Adds exactly the right classy touch I was hoping for. I feel like royalty every time I step out onto this after a shower, after years of ugly bath mats. :3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bamboo Mat
customer_reviews.text: Most economical bamboo mat out there. It is thick and slip resistant on ceramic tile.
customer_reviews.author: Anjum I.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is well crafted and sturdy. The material is high quality bamboo. It's not slippery at all, even when it's wet! It's a beautiful accent in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Thank you :)
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Thank you!!! I'm going to order 2 more, at least :))
customer_reviews.author: Doreen G. Redford

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Feels great if you have sensitive skin in your feet, perfect size and colour
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Can be slippery but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I live in an apartment with 3 roommates, so the bathroom gets a lot of use. Haven't had any issues with mold or mildew growing on the under side. Only con: It has slipped out from under me once--there isn't much grip in the wood the way it's sealed--but i'm more careful now and it hasn't happened again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Works well in our RV
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our trailer RV in the shower/toilet . It makes it easier for my wife to stand .
customer_reviews.author: dogs

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is too small for my shower ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is too small for my shower so I tried to order another one and Amazon said unavailable now :(
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us for a few months. Always on ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us for a few months. Always on it's side to dry but mold still developed and the small brad nails did not hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I expected. Originally it did not state the size. I took a chance hoping it would be the size I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are so tender, and the spacing between the slats hurts. Returned them and received immediate refund.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Larson

product_meta.title: BAMBUROBA Bath Shower Mat Bamboo Bathroom Floor Non-Sliding Square Spa Sauna Mat with 22x15-Inch
feature_bullets: SHOWER MAT WITH 100% MASO BAMBOO: more sturdy and durable than wood and oak
NON-SLIDING SAFE BATH MAT: elevated by soft rubber feet to protect your floor better
CLEVE DESIGN WITH SLOTTED PANELS: allow water to dry and the air to circulate, it with PU painting which is Eco-friendly and ensuring the shower mat longer use
SUPERIOR MORDEN BATHROOM MAT WITH COLOR BOX: more luxury and eco-friendly than plastic make it a perfect gift for your family and friends
NO NEED ASSEMBLE: easy-maintenance board needs only warm water to clean and air dry after daily use, large surface measures by 21.25" x14.17"x 1.18"
